features: 0.5 mm Fine Point Smooth Writing Pens: These annotation pens have a perfect fine point for good writing control. The ink goes onto the paper with fine and clean lines, great writing pens for journaling and note taking.

Quick-Drying Black Gel Ink Pens : The fine lines these pens make dry fast so they really don’t smudge much. And it flows very smoothly without skipping and no blobs of ink making a mess. No need to worry about getting ink on your hands or desk.

Comfy to Hold and Use: Retractable rolling ball gel pens themselves have a very nice soft feel and grip in addition to a nice weight when holding the pen. Easy to use, durable, you will love the texture of the pens.

Pen Clip Design with a Little Smooth Steel Ball: There is a little ball that moves on the clip, make the pen easily attached to notebooks pockets and binders, slide without marks, effectively reducing the scratch on the paper. Also, the little steel ball on the clip is very entertaining to spin.

Perfect Stationery gifts: These Japanese style neutral pens included 10 pcs of high-end morandi and retro color gel pens. They come very nicely boxed which made them a nice gift idea as a treat. Also, they are cute office and school supplies accessories for men women kids children students in the classroom, school and office.

High-end morandi gel pens Japanese style neutral pens, retro color Retractable design, click to open and close

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The cleanest writing.
reviews.reviewText: Love these pens. They are fine point and perfect. The tips of these pens are great. They don't bleed heavy or collect ink around the tips. They dry quick with no smear. The pens feel great in your hands. Silky/velvety to the touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are nice pens. I like gel ink pens and these write clean and smooth. The design is a little different and I’m not sure whether or not I like the looks. I really haven’t given it much thought. But I definitely like the way they write.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive gel pens that are a pleasure to write with.
reviews.reviewText: If you're an avid note taker, journaler, or just wish to have some nice pens on-hand in your bag, these are definitely worth considering. Regardless the type of writing, these have been a pleasure to use. They're a little slim, making them easy to hold, have a soft-textured exterior that's pleasing to touch, and come in a variety of color choices. I picked up the darker color set and have been really enjoying the aesthetic. As they're a gel ink pen, they also write smooth and dry quickly - a bonus in all applications! Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: i love the muted colors of these pens. the shades remind me of autumn. the gel pens have a nice easy and smooth ink, without spitting or sputtering. the feel of these pens in the hand is also very comfortable I received this product as part of the Amazon Vine program in exchange for an honest review. I am responsible for all federal and state income tax on products that I receive from Amazon Vine. My participation in Amazon Vine is not dependent on how I rate a product, but that I give honest reviews, irregardless of the rating I give the product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Uwbettry Black Gel Ink Pens are a fantastic addition to my writing essentials. The fine point ensures smooth and precise writing, making it perfect for various tasks. The quick-dry feature is a game-changer, preventing any smudges or smears on my documents. The sleek design of the pen is not only aesthetically pleasing but also comfortable to hold during long writing sessions. This pen set has become my go-to choice for everyday writing needs, and I highly recommend it for anyone seeking a reliable and smooth-writing gel pen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looking for some smooth writing pens? Look no further. These pens look really nice and do an amazing job when writing too.What caught my eye firsf was the ball bearing that was used in the clip portion since I think that was a very nice touch to make the pens a bit different. It makes removing and storing the pens easier from the pocket but also gives the pens a very different look.As for writing, the 0.5 mm supsr fine point will write vary smooth and gives some very nice even ink flow. So far I have not had issues with gaps in the writing or any of them running dry. Great set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Consistent and clear
reviews.reviewText: I've been using all five consistently for a month, and they have worked perfectly so far. Nice crisp lines, even when I write in my tiny font. It also did not bleed through the various kinds of paper I used. There is some risk of smearing the ink for a few seconds.Out of five, one has started to run less smoothly than the others, but it is still consistent enough to be useful. Still at 4 of 5 for under $10, this is a really good price for a set of reliable pens. I'll definitely keep these on my shortlist when I need to restock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent pens. This style is one I've only started to see this year, and now have some from a few different brands. These ones do feel quite a bit better than some others I've tested, and the colors are extremely rich tones! I keep my own pens for letters & such, and love ones that can write as smoothly as these ones do. I've also begun taking these particular pens with me whenever I work on my bullet journal - these are the only ones that will glide easily, not have a weird bleed, and still allow me to highlight over the writing with minimal bleed. I've rewritten some notes from a college class I took, and used these pens, which incidentally made scanning them a breeze. 10/10 pen if you're looking for something halfway between a gel pen & a micron felt tip.
